Ingredients.4: 4  bone-in chicken breast halves, with skin

Directions.1: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.

Directions.2: In a small bowl, combine the honey, hot pepper sauce and ground black pepper and mix well. Cover each chicken breast with the sauce and put on the grill, basting occasionally.

Directions.3: Grill for 10 to 15 minutes per side, or until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees F (80 degrees C). Chicken will have a nice, brown color from the sauce.
